content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: ladder
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 7, "index": 14}, {"type": "polished_granite", "quantity": 18, "index": 18}, {"type": "purpur_stairs", "quantity": 54, "index": 19}, {"type": "oak_button", "quantity": 38, "index": 22}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 37, "index": 26}, {"type": "yellow_wool", "quantity": 59, "index": 31}, {"type": "cyan_banner", "quantity": 14, "index": 32}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 46, "index": 38}, {"type": "green_stained_glass", "quantity": 24, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a ladder I need to place 7 sticks in the crafting table. I will start by moving the stick from slot 14 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: ladder
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 6, "index": 14}, {"type": "polished_granite", "quantity": 18, "index": 18}, {"type": "purpur_stairs", "quantity": 54, "index": 19}, {"type": "oak_button", "quantity": 38, "index": 22}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 37, "index": 26}, {"type": "yellow_wool", "quantity": 59, "index": 31}, {"type": "cyan_banner", "quantity": 14, "index": 32}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 46, "index": 38}, {"type": "green_stained_glass", "quantity": 24, "index": 44}]
thought: I have moved 1 stick into slot 1. I now need to move another stick into slot 3, which is above slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 3 with quantity 1

Ok
